page-content:
## Personal data

The information collected through the form is neither recorded nor stored. The person in charge of data management is Stéphane Luçon, residing 5 montée des Chrestianne, Pierrevert.

The information marked by an asterisk in the form is mandatory as it is required to send the SMS or e-mail to your contact.

The collected data will be shared with the following recipients: OVH Télécom, the company sending the SMS, and SendMail, the company sending the e-mails.

Your personal data will be stored for no more than one day.

You can access your personal data to correct or erase any information, or to exercise your right to privacy regarding data processing.

See cnil.fr for further information regarding your rights.

To exercise your rights or for any other questions regarding data processing by our service, please contact Stéphane Luçon: contact@instantvisio.com or +33(0)7 87 71 57 87.

If, after getting in touch with us, you still consider that your rights to data privacy are violated, you can file a complaint with the CNIL.
